enbody: Ms.Fang with Ms.Yanfei Li (Red shirt), Deputy President of Beijing Municipal Bureau of Land and Resources, Mr.Paul Kan, Investor Services of BC Ministry of Jobs, Tourism, and Innovations of Canada, Mr Mark Mao (Right), General Manager of Canada Sinomine Resources Exploration.
chbody: 方女士(右四) 陪同北京国土资源局李燕飞副局长(中间)一行与加拿大卑诗省就业,旅游,开发部投资经理Paul Kan (左四) 探讨页岩气开发政策. 右一为中勘资源勘探公司加拿大分公司经理毛付龙先生.

enbody: Ms Fang made the introduction and participated in the M&A negotiation between Sinomine Resources Exploration China and a Canadian junior company.
chbody: 为中矿资源勘探公司在加拿大寻找并购/反向收购对象并参与谈判, 王平卫, 总经理 (右二), 法律顾问罗回平律师 (右一).
